thread.title: Music has no boundaries: Tribute to Ghulam Ali by radio station
thread.title_full: Music has no boundaries: Tribute to Ghulam Ali by radio station - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Music has no boundaries: Tribute to Ghulam Ali by radio station
text:
He may have missed a chance to perform in Mumbai following Shiv Sena 's protest, but the songs and melodies of Pakistan i ghazal maestro Ghulam Ali will transcend across the border with a special musical tribute on a radio channel on Sunday.*Ghulam Ali*
Radio Mirchi 98.3 FM will be playing songs by Ghulam Ali, who has regaled ... Â»
